metadata.title: CVE-2024-47704 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drm/amd/display: Check link_res->hpo_dp_link_enc before using it  [WHAT & HOW] Functions dp_enable_link_phy and dp_disable_link_phy can pass link_res without initializing hpo_dp_link_enc and it is necessary to check for null before dereferencing.  This fixes 2 FORWARD_NULL issues reported by Coverity.
